DOC.brief_summary: This study assess clinical potency several exposure level QGE031 decrease sensitivity peanut allergen .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety 4 Doses QGE031 Patients 18-50 Years Age With Peanut Allergy
DOC.criteria: Main Diagnosis acute peanut allergy manifest urticaria , angioedema , gastrointestinal respiratory tract symptom , acute onset symptom ingestion ( 2 hour ) . Positive peanut food challenge baseline , i.e. , objective allergic event level 300mg ( cumulative ) peanut protein placebo test .
